nodes.text: The Amaxine warriors had a camp on the planet Daxam IV in 28 ABY.. The Amaxine warriors were a paramilitary faction that admired the Old Empire and were arming for a confrontation with the New Republic. The camp was home to at least a thousand Amaxine warriors and included facilities for starfighters. At the center of the camp lay a clearing that was used by the warriors to practice with Force pikes. After visiting Arliz Hadrassian's compound to collect his Emperor's Royal Guard's helmet, Ransolm Casterfo engaged in a mock duel with an Amaxine warrior at the camp.
